\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\begin{defn} A $P$\textbf{-tree }on $n$-leaves is a non-planted
ordered tree with leaves labeled $\ell_{1},\dots,\ell_{n}$ such that
the following two properties are satisfied:
\begin{enumerate}
\item Every root-to-length path has the same length.
\item The number of nodes at distance $i$ from the root must be strictly
smaller than the number of nodes at distance $i+1$, until reaching
the leaves.
\end{enumerate}
\begin{defn}
\end{document}
